content:
1. It is occurring here on Zulip - #Covid-19 Response
  2. It is an HL7 thing, not an ONC thing

Vassil Peytchev said:

  1. It is occurring here on Zulip - #Covid-19 Response
  2. It is an HL7 thing, not an ONC thing

So strange - I searched "SANER" in Zulip and got nothing! What you say makes sense though.

I thought it was an ONC thing because when I googled "SANER" plus "FHIR", ONC is what came up first.
Maybe search works only on channels people are subscribed to? When I am in all messages, and search for SANER, I see results from the Covid-19 Response stream.
Search only looks at stuff youre subscribed to

Lloyd McKenzie said:

Search only looks at stuff youre subscribed to

Well THAT's a good way to avoid cross-pollenation...
you can do like many of us and subscribe to everything... I would not recommend it
Really weird that it doesn't have the equivalent of Gmail's "in:anywhere"
are you looking for "streams:public" ? that's what I've come to prefixing all my zulip searches with to actually find anything.
